title: SEMANTiCS Questions – PANTOPIX
text: PANTOPIX, one of our gold sponsors, provides responses to four questions received from SEMANTiCS.

title: Introducing the SEMANTiCS 2023 Workshops
text: We are pleased to announce the workshop series for SEMANTiCS 2023!  Among the workshops that have been accepted, there are two reruns of successfully organized workshops from the previous years of the SEMANTiCS conference. We also have a shiny new edition on a very hot topic. Let’s take a closer look.

title: Hot trends and use cases for Semantics
text: Christian Dirschl and Marco Brattinga, long-time Industry Chairs for Semantics, discuss current trends and use cases for semantic technology in business.

title: 19th edition of the SEMANTiCS conference in Leipzig
text: We are thrilled to announce that the 18th edition of SEMANTiCS, the leading European conference on semantic technologies, will be held from 20 to 22 September in Leipzig, Germany. Dr. Sahar Vahdati, Research Group Leader at the Institute of Applied Informatics (InfAI), will be taking over the position of the conference chair.

title: Recordings, Proceedings and Slides of 2022
text: Dear Friends and attendees. It was an honor to have you at SEMANTiCS 2022. I'm sure that you had some inspiring moments and fine talks.  For later reading or listening, we collected the materials as far as available.

title: From CMS to Intelligent Content Hub: Why the need for a change?
text: For many companies, while content management systems and digital libraries get the job done in terms of storing documents, legacy systems often lack the ability to make documents “actionable” – which is to say that data and content are not discoverable, networkable nor reusable.

title: A Shinning Example of Explainable AI
text: RDFox, a newfound ability to ask business-centred questions and retrieve insightful answers in return.

title: The marriage of Knowledge Graph Data with Automation, Intelligence and Processing Power
text: How Cognizone makes the power of semantics more accessible for any kind of organisations.
